Post.title: CSS
Post._content:
CCSweb ### web HTML+ CSS+ javascript 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. ### CSS 1) 3headlinkcsscssn 2) headstylecss 3) style 4) @import url(css/name.css) ; ```html

``` ### CSS {}HTML p{colorred width100px} 1.ID #+ID 2. ID .+ 3. 4. ++ 5. ++ 6. + !important ### CSS margin margin: margin-topmargin-rightmargin-bottommargin-left padding margin padding margin overflowhidden border border-top|right|bottom|leftborder-width ```css div{ width: 0; height: 0; border: 50px solid black; border-color: transparent green transparent transparent; } ``` display block inline inline-block none body ```html
``` index.html ### font-family:1,2, ```css p{ font-family:,Arail,Tahoma; /* ArailTahoma, */ } ``` font-sizepx|%|em|rem (body16px 1em=1*1rem 1rem = 1*html ```css p{ font-size:16px; } ``` font-stylenormal | italic | oblique font-weight normal | bold | bolder | lighter | number400-normal700-bold 100-900 fontfont-style | font-weight | font-size | font-family ### #### 1. color colorred RGB colorrgb000color#ffffff color#fff #### 2. text-decorationnone | underline() | overline | line-through #### 3. line-height:normal | lengthpx | em text-indentlengthpx | em text-align:left | center | right | justify() vertical-aligntop | middle | bottom word-spacingnormal | length letter-spacingnormal | length #### background-color background-imagenone | url(); background-repeatno-repeat | repeat-x | repeat-y background-positionx y background-attachmentscroll | fixed background#ccc scroll ### 1.floatnone | left | right floatwidthheight 2.clear: none | left | right | both ```css .clear:after{ content:''; display:block; clear:both; }/*clear*/ ``` 3.overflow:xoverflow-xyoverflow-y visble hidden auto scroll 4.visitlity:visible| hidden visitlity:hidden;dispalynone; 5.position:absolute | relative | static | fixed(ie8) | inherit z-index left/right/top/bottom:length | auto() 6.opacity:number(0-1)IE8 filteralphaopacity=numberIEIE ### a link visited hover active ### ```css body,h1,h2,h3,h4,p,dl,dd,ul,ol,form,input,textarea,th,td,select{margin: 0;padding: 0;} em{font-style: normal;} li{list-style: none;} a{text-decoration: none;} img{border: none;vertical-align: top;} table{border-collapse: collapse;} input,textarea{outline: none;} textarea{resize:none;overflow: auto;} body{font-size:12px;font-family: arial;} ``` CSS ```css word-wrap:break-word; ``` ### css html marginpaddingborder ### CSS 1. overflow 2. marginpadding 3. PDIV ,AA 4. word-wrap:break-word; 5. ### BFC BFC(Block Formatting Contexts)""Block Formatting ContextsBFC floatnone overflowvisible positionrelativestatic displaytable-cell, table-caption, inline-block BFC ### IFC IFC(Inline Formatting Contexts)""IFCline boxpadding/margin) IFC inline-blockIFCtext-align IFCvertical-align:middle ### IE6 IE6 IE6IE6hasLayoutIE6IE6doctype border+padding+ hasLayoutIE6csszoom:1;doctype ### cCSS hack 1.IEfirefoxchromeoperasafari 2.\9 IE background:red\9; 3._- IE6 _background:orange; 4.* IE6E7 *background:black; 5.\0 IE8IE9opera 6.\9\0 IE8IE9 7.\0\9 IE8IE9

``` index.html ### font-family:1,2, ```css p{ font-family:,Arail,Tahoma; /* ArailTahoma, */ } ``` font-sizepx|%|em|rem (body16px 1em=1*1rem 1rem = 1*html ```css p{ font-size:16px; } ``` font-stylenormal | italic | oblique font-weight normal | bold | bolder | lighter | number400-normal700-bold 100-900 fontfont-style | font-weight | font-size | font-family ### #### 1. color colorred RGB colorrgb000color#ffffff color#fff #### 2. text-decorationnone | underline() | overline | line-through #### 3. line-height:normal | lengthpx | em text-indentlengthpx | em text-align:left | center | right | justify() vertical-aligntop | middle | bottom word-spacingnormal | length letter-spacingnormal | length #### background-color background-imagenone | url(); background-repeatno-repeat | repeat-x | repeat-y background-positionx y background-attachmentscroll | fixed background#ccc scroll ### 1.floatnone | left | right floatwidthheight 2.clear: none | left | right | both ```css .clear:after{ content:''; display:block; clear:both; }/*clear*/ ``` 3.overflow:xoverflow-xyoverflow-y visble hidden auto scroll 4.visitlity:visible| hidden visitlity:hidden;dispalynone; 5.position:absolute | relative | static | fixed(ie8) | inherit z-index left/right/top/bottom:length | auto() 6.opacity:number(0-1)IE8 filteralphaopacity=numberIEIE ### a link visited hover active ### ```css body,h1,h2,h3,h4,p,dl,dd,ul,ol,form,input,textarea,th,td,select{margin: 0;padding: 0;} em{font-style: normal;} li{list-style: none;} a{text-decoration: none;} img{border: none;vertical-align: top;} table{border-collapse: collapse;} input,textarea{outline: none;} textarea{resize:none;overflow: auto;} body{font-size:12px;font-family: arial;} ``` CSS ```css word-wrap:break-word; ``` ### css html marginpaddingborder ### CSS 1. overflow 2. marginpadding 3. PDIV ,AA 4. word-wrap:break-word; 5. ### BFC BFC(Block Formatting Contexts)""Block Formatting ContextsBFC floatnone overflowvisible positionrelativestatic displaytable-cell, table-caption, inline-block BFC ### IFC IFC(Inline Formatting Contexts)""IFCline boxpadding/margin) IFC inline-blockIFCtext-align IFCvertical-align:middle ### IE6 IE6 IE6IE6hasLayoutIE6IE6doctype border+padding+ hasLayoutIE6csszoom:1;doctype ### cCSS hack 1.IEfirefoxchromeoperasafari 2.\9 IE background:red\9; 3._- IE6 _background:orange; 4.* IE6E7 *background:black; 5.\0 IE8IE9opera 6.\9\0 IE8IE9 7.\0\9 IE8IE9
